title: STAT+: Major pharma companies may avoid Medicare experiments’ forced price cuts
description: Several pharmaceutical companies that struck drug pricing deals with the White House said they're exempt from the Medicare demonstrations.
content: Several pharmaceutical companies that struck drug pricing deals with the White House said they're exempt from the Medicare demonstrations.
